mapper.insert: insert into tbl_comment(comment_content, member_id, post_id) values (#{commentContent}, #{memberId}, #{postId})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_comment c join tbl_member m on c.member_id = m.id left join tbl_member_profile_file mpf on m.id = mpf.member_id left join tbl_file f on mpf.id = f.id where c.post_id = #{postId} and c.comment_status = 'active' order by c.created_date desc
select count(*) from tbl_comment where post_id = #{postId} and comment_status = 'active'

select p.post_title, c.comment_content, c.created_date from tbl_member m join tbl_comment c on m.id = c.member_id join tbl_post p on m.id = p.member_id where p.post_status = 'active' and (m.member_email like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or m.member_Name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')) order by p.created_date desc

select count(*) from tbl_member m join tbl_comment c on m.id = c.member_id join tbl_post p on m.id = p.member_id where p.post_status = 'active' and (m.member_email like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or m.member_Name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
mapper.update: update tbl_comment c join tbl_member m on c.member_id = m.id set c.likes_count = c.likes_count + 1, m.member_suggestion_count = m.member_suggestion_count + 1 where c.id = #{id}

update tbl_comment c join tbl_member m on c.member_id = m.id set c.likes_count = c.likes_count - 1, m.member_suggestion_count = m.member_suggestion_count - 1 where c.id = #{id} and c.likes_count > 0 and m.member_suggestion_count > 0
